segments.text: Stop running around in front of the TV , will you ? Why don't you just sit and watch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've tried , but I can't stand the bald man talking so loudly in the program .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then stay away . No one is keeping you from doing that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be so irritable . I just don't understand the program , that's all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , I will explain it to you later on . Now scram .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I will wait until you have had your fun , if that's what you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's exactly what I want , thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
